brief_title: Biological Aspects of Depression and Antidepressant Drugs
brief_summary: This study will be measuring changes in depressive symptoms over a 7 week time period. Double-blind placebo controlled trial using the pharmacologic agents Paroxetine or Desipramine.
criteria: - Diagnosis of major depressive disorder Ham-D Score > 18 - English speaking with ability to read and sign an informed consent
